byline.original: By OMAR AL-JAWOSHY and ANNE BARNARD

lead_paragraph: The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for a bombing in eastern Iraq, and officials on Saturday said that the death toll had risen to 100 people, with 20 more missing.

headline.main: Iraq: Toll Rises in Market Bombing
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Toll Rises in Market Bombing
